title: Chicken pasta with a mango cream sauce
ingredients: ['250g uncooked rigatoni pasta', '1 tablespoon olive oil, divided', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets - cubed', '1 onion, sliced and separated into rings', '1 green pepper, cut into thin strips', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon minced fresh root ginger', '1 mango - peeled, stone removed and chopped', '250ml double cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '4 sprigs fresh parsley, for garnish']
